channel.title: ITU-T on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in ITU-T on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: Humanizing AI: Reflections on 2025 and the Road Ahead for 2026
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: As we close 2025 and step into 2026, this moment offers more than a calendar transitionâ€”it offers clarity. The past year tested assumptions, accelerated adoption, and forced recalibration across technology, business, and society. For me personally, 2025 was a milestone year. After reflecting on two decades in the industry, I published my second book, Jagjeevan: Living Larger Than Life, in both Hindi and English, while continuing to engage readers through Exploring the Metaverse.
